SYSTEM: AndresGarcia_PHD2ndYear.pdf: Página 4
• Folksonomy
•
Emerging classification scheme from social tagging systems 
•
Folk: People, Taxonomy: Classification
•
Represented by: Users, Tags, Resources
•
Two Tags are related if:
• They co-occur when annotating a resource
• They co-occur when a user use them
4
